Html:
Currently we can tag items for Optimization (GREEN), but would it be possible to tag them in other ways?

Tag them YELLOW for it not to be included in Optimization, but always be visible in the same way GREENS are visible. This would be for "Watching". Say I really want that piece that will cost me 75 Emblems of Triumph, but I only have 6, then I can keep an eye on this as a goal.

Tag them RED for it to not to be included in Optimization and not be displayed unless I ask for it to display RED icons. This I would use to filter out things like "Requires Arena Points" or "Only Purchasable by Opposing Faction" or for whatever reason I do not want to look at it anymore.

This could be added to the already existing "Right Click" menu on the Diamond.
